DOC.brief_summary: The cluster randomize trial ( CITFOMIST ) conduct 15-19-year old guidance high school student gender different district Tehran , Iranian capital , winter 2011 . The 36 school enrol study randomly assign receive one three group milk -- whole milk , milk contain 600 IU Vit D/1000cc , milk contain 1000 IU Vit D /1000cc -- 30-day period . In order study effect vitamin D-fortified milk circulate concentration 25 ( OH ) D , serum vitamin D level check subgroup intervention .
DOC.detailed_description: The cluster randomize trial ( CITFOMIST ) conduct 15-19-year old guidance high school student gender different district Tehran , Iranian capital , winter 2011 . The 36 school enrol study randomly assign receive one three group milk -- whole milk , milk contain 600 international unit ( IU ) Vit D/1000cc ( 120IU ) , milk contain 1000 IU Vit D /1000cc ( 200IU ) -- 30-day period . In order study effect vitamin D-fortified milk circulate concentration 25 ( OH ) D , serum vitamin D level check subgroup intervention .
DOC.criteria: 1519year old guidance high school student gender different district Tehran , Iranian capital Those take vitamin D supplement Those underlying disease affect bone health Those take medication affect bone metabolism Those take fortified product regular basis Those follow special diet
